Action.author: alexanderzhovnuvaty
Action.body: ~rush2arc today i successfully installed Hyperledger Sawtooth 1.2.5 on Ubuntu 20 64bit in Raspberry Pi 4 4Gb. And it worked fine (i was able to commit transactions using XO client and retrieve data from blockchain) However there is no official binaries yet. Setup should be adopted/customized.
